alert.note: Alert for Canadian; Cleveland; Grady; McClain; Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 07 at 8:12AM CDT until July 07 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN GRADY...OKLAHOMA...SOUTHWESTERN LINCOLN... CLEVELAND...EASTERN CANADIAN...NORTHWESTERN POTTAWATOMIE AND NORTHWESTERN MCCLAIN COUNTIES... At 811 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Oklahoma City to 3 miles northeast of Stanley Draper Lake to near Norman, moving east at 45 mph. A 61 mph gust was recorded at Will Rogers Airport at 806 am. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Oklahoma City, Norman, Edmond, Moore, Midwest City, Shawnee, Del City, Newcastle, Tecumseh, Bethany, Mustang, Choctaw, Warr Acres, The Village, Noble, Tuttle, Piedmont, Harrah, Slaughterville, and McLoud. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
